result.execSummary:
The defendant Demetris L Ford was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Carry Concealed Weapon, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 941.23(2).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

parties.name: Milwaukee County Clerk of Circuit Court
Milwaukee County Clerk of Circuit Court

supervisions.notes: Pay all applicable court costs and fees at a rate of $50.00 per month commencing 03-01-16 until paid in full, or to be docketed as a civil judgment/tax intercept.
Consecutive to: Any other sentence; Court granted Huber privileges for work crew ONLY. Sentence to commence FORTHWITH

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Demetris L Ford

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Due to not following the payment plan agreement, specifically payment(s) were missed, the payment plan has been ended and the failure to pay action has been enforced.
See CCAP financial payment plan application for specific monthly due dates for this UTPPP.

Defendant Demetris L Ford in court with attorney Alexis Liggins.  Daniel J. Gabler appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Sentencing proceeded.  Statements by the State, defense and defendant.  
AS TO COUNT 1:
The Court ordered defendant to serve 5 months in the House of Correction, consecutive to any other sentence, with credit for 5 days time served. Court granted huber privileges for work crew only.  
Court ordered defendant to pay all applicable court costs and fees at a rate of $50 per month commencing 3/1/16 until paid in full, or to be docketed as a civil judgment/tax intercept.
Sentence to commence FORTHWITH. Court ordered defendant REMANDED into the custody of the Milwaukee County Sheriff's Department.
Filed;
-Notice of Right to Seek Postconviction Relief;
-Pretrial Incarceration Credit.

Defendant Demetris L Ford in court with attorney Alexis Liggins.  Sara Nicole Volden Schroeder appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk ssm.

AS TO COUNT 2:  Pursuant to plea negotiations and on motion of the State, Court ordered count dismissed and read-in.

AS TO COUNT 1:  Defendant changes his plea to GUILTY.  Defendant examined as to his plea, advised of his Constitutional rights and the maximum penalty.   Defendant advised that if not a United States Citizen, deportation is possible.  Court found that defendant knowingly, voluntarily and intelligently waived his rights.  Guilty Plea Questionnaire/Waiver of Rights and Addendum received and filed.  Parties stipulate to the complaint as a factual basis to sustain defendant's plea.  Court found defendant guilty and ordered a Judgment of Conviction be entered on the record.  Defendant shall provide a DNA sample for the Data Bank.  Court ordered case adjourned for sentencing in Branch 24.  Sentencing hearing scheduled for September 23, 2015 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Demetris L Ford in court with attorney Alexis Liggins.  Daniel J. Gabler appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk ssm.  Court ordered case adjourned for projected guilty plea in Branch 24.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for August 5, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Demetris L Ford in court with attorney Alexis Liggins.  Daniel J. Gabler appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Pretrial conference conducted.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for June 5, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Court ordered no possession or use of controlled substances without a valid prescription.
No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.
Defendant advised if released from custody it is a requirement to attend all future court proceedings.
Failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping, a warrant issued or high cash bail.

Defendant Demetris L Ford in court with attorney Alexis Liggins.  Defendant Demetris L Ford in custody.  
Carole Manchester appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Protasiewicz, Branch 24.  
Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  
Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant plead not guilty.  
DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION.  
Pre-trial conference scheduled for May 12, 2015 at 01:30 pm.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
